description:
See http://wp.me/pXWG8-1r for changes in the latest release! EvaDots is a delightfully fun & addicting game for the WebOs platform. It is compatible with both the Pre and Pixi devices. The goal is simple: try to get as many moving dots on the playfield as possible without having any of the dots collide. If any dots collide, the game is over. The dots move at the same rate, so as long as a collision is avoided once, those dots should never collide. One hundred points are awarded for each dot on the screen. Features: * Customizable gameplay – control the speed and color of the dots, the playfield background, and other gameplay elements. * Global online highscore table – At the end of each game, a score can be submitted to an online leaderboard. See how well your score compares with players around the world! 

Feel free to give the free version a try first!

Thanks a lot for downloading, and have fun!
